topic: What is one thing you’ve learned from an elder that you still live by?
If you could spend one full day with your grandparents or grandchildren, what would you do?
What do you think makes children and elders connect so beautifully?
What advice would you give to your young self when you become an elder?
What’s one childhood habit that still makes you smile today?
What’s one “childish” thing you still secretly enjoy?
If children ruled the world, what would be the first law they’d make?
